des: "This is a glaze that goes well on pork or chicken. It also serves as a dipping sauce for pork, chicken, or seafood."
ins: Mix marmalade, mustard, horseradish sauce, hot sauce, and salt together in a bowl. Refrigerate until chilled, at least 30 minutes.
